mdRecord.dcterms:title: Confirmations-Schein
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Evangelical Lutheran Church. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text within ornamental border;, with cuts of an angel at the top, two doves in the lower left corner, and grain, wrapped in a grape vine in the lower right corner. [original]
First line of song: Sen Gott getreu, halt seinen Bund ... [original]
On verso: within an ornamental border, "1827 / Philip Henkel. / No. / Preis"; "E.W. Rupert" printed along the right edge of the sheet. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Accompanied by a photocopy (negative) made from the original in the collection of Mrs. Henry Tusing of New Market, Va. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Confirmation--Evangelical Lutheran Church
